original_text: Now the acts of King David, from first to last, are written in the Chronicles of Samuel the seer, and in the Chronicles of Nathan the prophet, and in the Chronicles of Gad the seer,
korean_text: 다윗 왕의 행적은 처음부터 끝까지 선견자 사무엘의 글과 선지자 나단의 글과 선견자 갓의 글에 다 기록되고

sentences.original_text: Now the acts of King David,
are written in the Chronicles of Samuel the seer,
and in the Chronicles of Nathan the prophet,
and in the Chronicles of Gad the seer,
